answerText: infinite square well [or particle in a box or infinite potential well][10] The eigenfunctions that describe the solution to the particle in a box consist of linear combinations of these two orthonormal functions; these two functions are also used to decompose a function into Fourier components.

question: Question: This system is described by a potential that is zero between the locations a and -a and contains impenetrable boundaries at a and -a.  [10] Identify this common model system in quantum mechanics.
